评论详情: I wear these shoes 8 hours a day 4 to 6 days a week. The bottoms are super grippy, it's even on wet ground.  they still look brand new. Super comfy from day one. No foot pain., no break in period, .
I have purchased one of these in 2019, Still too good without any signs of wearing OR tearing.  Re-purchased a new one and surprised to see it's of the same quality!!
I’m a size 13 and a 12.5 was recommended. Couldn’t even get them on. Returned them without taking a step.

评论概述: You can go the distance in these shoes!
评论详情: I bought these shoes originally in October of 2021. Many of the shoes these days squeeze your toes into the end of the shoe in an unnatural position causing toe discomfort. I purchased these because I like the idea of a minimalist shoe and the way it solved the issue with a wide toe box. I have worn these in my driveway while I'm working on vehicles,  shopping with my wife, and hiking on the trails while camping.  They are very durable as you can see from the pictures. They are over 3 years old now so I bought another pair. (Old shoe and new shoe in the pictures) You can see how much of the tread I have worn down and how well the shoes still look. I believe these are a great value for your money. I don't write many reviews but I wanted to share my experience because these are a clear winner!

Transitioning to minimalist shoes through altra shoes has been tough but fun. I used to suffer from PF and collapsed my arch, been working on strengthening my feet and more mobility as i turn 40. This shoe has changed my leg days and for the quarter of the price of a name brand, this shoe does well in performance and comfort, i removed the insole for a true barefoot experience. Will keep using these until im strong enough and i will switch to vivo’s
The most comfortable shoes ever!
Theses shoes didnt even last one year.  I emailed customer service and they let me know since the warranty period is only six minths , i was three months out of warranty.
These are really nice shoes, but the sole made them way too narrow for my feet (H-width). If you have EEEE or larger widths, avoid these. They won't work for you.

I've been struggling with knee & back pain and finding a shoe that doesn't hinder either or both is difficult.  This provide the perfect amount of stability and traction.  They aren't the most stylish but I will say they have quickly become my go-to over my Crocks.
They work really well with running and have fair arch support
Size was perfect, great design & very comfortable.

评论概述: looks a little different than a regular workout shoe
评论详情: No padding, which is what the description says. Great substitution if your regular workout shoe is unstable with too much cushioning.

Was a little concerned when I first ordered that the wide toe box might give them a clown shoe appearance. Not the case at all. Actually look pretty cool on your feet. Haven't had them long enough to comment on durability. But I can definitely attest to their comfort. And, at this price?! Already ordered another pair.

I was excited to receive these new barefoot shoes after watching some informative YouTube videos about how effective they can be on your feet. Today I wore them for the first time and after widening up the laces a bit, I'm pleasantly surprised at how comfortable these are - like walking on a cloud! Surprisingly these feel fantastic on my feet, unlike Vibram's Five Fingers that I tried to wear many years ago. I've been wearing Skechers wide width for almost 2 years and my feet have naturally started to adjust to a wide fit. When I wear regular sneakers now they are just too tight! So getting into these Whitin barefoot shoes was a natural transition. I was expecting to break these in over time, as some have suggested, but I have very little to no pain. For the price, these are of amazing quality. I appreciate the wide toe box promoting a natural gait. These are also perfect for weightlifting at the gym! I love how I'm building strength in my feet, ankles, and legs. I also am starting to enjoy the feeling of different textures depending on the floor, whether that be concrete, pavement, or trail. I highly recommend them!

7.5 was a tad too tight around my toes so I returned them for a 8.5. They’re a bit roomy but I don’t mind. I’m a woman but I ordered these because I wanted a wider fit. They seem wide enough for my feet. They’re comfortable And lightweight. I bought these to walk my dog. I would purchase from this brand again.

I have owned these for 2 and a half months, and I wear them for my daily walk of about 4 miles on a paved surface. I do not wear them at any other time. While they are comfortable, they are not durable. The tread has already worn through the heal, the insert also wore through, and one of the tabs ripped off the first week I had them.
I tried others now I’m back to Witten

评论概述: Great barefoot shoes for the price
评论详情: I've always been a five fingers fan but they're pricey and it's hit or miss if they'll cause blisters or not. I decided to try these shoes and am happy I did they are very comfortable and have a "barefoot" feel. They can easily be worn with or without socks (I wear thin socks to minimize smell on hot days). I got them and immediately wore them on a zoo trip, walking around 3 miles. No pain and no blisters (granted I am already use to barefoot shoes).  I'm a size 10.5 shoe and size 11 fit great in these. They are very light and breathable, great for a summer shoe. If you're looking for a "casual" shoe then choose a different color. These almost have a water shoe look to them.  All in all a great purchase. My only complaint is the laces are annoying but those can be easily replaced.

My legs got sore from running with these shoes around1.5 miles as opposed to my other sneakers with thick cushions by the heel where I've ran 5 miles without my legs getting sore just goes to show that regular sneakers are cheat shoes . Another plus is that  i also felt forced to run on the balls of my feet instead of the heels. overall great purchase
Arrived on time, my second pair and the most successful so far. Very comfortable for running and just the right size.

These are not high-end shoes in design or build. I would be deeply concerned for anyone trying to run trails in them. They are more realistically casual, walk-around shoes; that's it. They do not secure well on your foot. The inner soles are on the thin side and can come out every time you take the shoes off. The shoes have a tendency to not exactly point forward, no matter how one to tries to adjust them. I wear them a lot as its one step up from going barefoot. They build stink and the inner soles need washing regularly.  A bit more design + quality and they might be close to awesome; might be.

评论概述: Barefoot Bliss: The Perfect Shoe for Every Adventure
评论详情: I’ve been on a relentless quest for the ultimate shoe, trying countless pairs from budget-friendly to high-end. I can confidently say that I’ve finally found it. These barefoot shoes are nothing short of revolutionary.  From the moment I slipped them on, I was hooked. Indoors, they feel like walking on clouds. It's as if I'm barefoot, but with the added benefit of protection. The sensation is pure bliss. But don't be fooled by their delicate feel – these shoes are built for adventure. I've taken them on hikes that would put many dedicated hiking boots to shame, and they've exceeded all expectations. The grip is incredible, providing ample traction on uneven terrain. And while they offer minimal cushioning, it's the perfect amount. The soft rubber sole allows you to feel the ground beneath your feet, providing a unique sensory experience that’s both invigorating and grounding.  One of the most surprising benefits is the foot massage-like sensation I get when walking on rocky surfaces. It's like nature's own reflexology treatment! The rocks provide gentle pressure points, relieving tension and invigorating my feet. It's an odd thing to say, but I actually look forward to walking on rocky trails just for this reason.  I was so impressed that I ended up buying five different colors! I simply can't get enough of these shoes. If you're tired of sacrificing comfort for style or performance, look no further. These barefoot shoes are the perfect blend of all three. Trust me, your feet will thank you.
The first time I put the right shoe on the heel pull to slip it on ripped off in my hand, no real pulling was involved. They are not comfortable.

评论概述: Consider if getting into barefoot/minimalist shoes
评论详情: Wanted to get into barefoot/minimalist shoes but didn't want to spend a lot and hate it. These shoes are very good for the price and I am not disappointed. I only use them to walk my dog between one and a half to two miles a day and I never have any pain from them.  The only thing I dislike is the pattern on the front of the shoe. To me it looks like they are trying to mimic the look of Vibram separate toe shoes.
Segunda vez que los pido, son muy cómodos y es cuestión de acostumbrarse luego de pasar tantos años usando zapatos normales. El motivo de mi calificación es porque me vino la talla incorrecta.

评论概述: Im replacing my well worn old pair. Love these simple shoes.
评论详情: I refer to these as my heavy duty socks, they are easy to slip on and comfortable, my old pair is well over 2 years old and worn, but not worn out. I wear them with or without socks, great for travel. I wouldn't take them on a hike or expect superior protection from sharp or pointed things, but that's kind of obvious despite the advertising.

I now have 3 pairs of these shoes and I love them! I have one pair strictly for working out in. They offer minimal cushion and allow your feet to engage while pushing weights. I have one pair that I use for everything yard, washing vehicles, etc. I have had them for about a year and they are pretty much destroyed but still going. I have the third pair for out and about and hiking. They slip on easily and wrap the foot nicely. Hiking long distances, greater than 4 miles, may warrant a more supportive shoe, but these are great for shorter excursions. It's nice to feel every contour of the ground which allows for a more engaged experience. The rubber is perfect for outdoors but can get a little slick inside if there is water on the floor. Overall, 100% recommend these for the outdoorsy type. Perfect camping shoes!
I've been running on the treadmill for months now and they're still like new! Great deal!

Overall, a great, durable, and comfortable shoe. I use these for trail and road running and they hold up. Unfortunately, despite being minimalist and thin they don't dry out very quickly on their own. I had to stuff newspaper into the shoes to help wick away accumulated moisture from rain and sweat.

评论概述: 2nd pair great for my flat feet
评论详情: I’ve tried a lot A lot of shoes over the last year, including Birkenstock and Merrills, but for whatever reason, these are the only shoes I found they don’t hurt my feet. I’ll continue to buy them as long as they don’t change.
I really find these Comfortable and they have held up well. my son loves his pair as well.
just OK

评论概述: Have maybe 3,000 miles of road and trail on these.
评论详情: They do exactly what they should and barely wear out. No failures, no breakages, no tears or rips. I still use them everyday after 3,000 plus miles of trail and road use.  If you run on trail I recommend gaiters. Altra gaiters work perfectly with these.  Xero shoes don't fit my right foot. None of there sizes do. Whitins fit both my feet perfectly regardless of a 2mm discrepancy I have in my right foot. They should be extremely proud as a company. They make products with a quality and practicality that America used to.
Great shoes at a great price.
The size of these shoes was as expected. The quality was a bit low. These worked well for working out but they stunk and fell apart within days.

评论概述: Great shoes, but no half size options
评论详情: Overall, I'm quite pleased with my purchase. These shoes offer an excellent ground feel, sturdy construction, and reasonable traction, which are perfect for my training needs.  However, I do have one main complaint: the lack of half-size options. As a result, I had to go half a size down from my regular size. While my left foot fits fine, my right foot feels a bit tight, with my toes almost touching the edge, especially when using the insole.  Despite this sizing issue, the shoes perform well and are comfortable for short training sessions. If you're considering these shoes, keep the sizing in mind, and you might need to experiment with the fit.  I hope Whitin will offer half-size options in the near future.
I really like this style of shoe. These are well made and very comfortable. The bottom of the shoe thick enough that rocks and roots don't hurt your feet.
This is my second pair. I wore the first almost daily for a year.

After over 2 decades of Marine Corps boots destroying my feet having to wear them all day too (my shins don't even grow hair anymore from those damn boots LoL), I would spend a lot of time barefoot at home trying to get my feet better. I saw these in a YouTube ad, looked them up here & decided to give them a try. I started with a pair for the gym, and I absolutely fell in love with how my feet were actually being feet again responding to the feedback of feeling the ground and having the room for my feet to spread out like I was barefoot at home. Very weird to get used to at first, but I wish I would have tried these years ago. I love them so much, this is my second pair to replace my everyday sneakers. Reviews online complain about the velcro tab, yeah it's not durable, but I just made a knot (see pic) and ensure I only pull with tension against the knot to keep from ripping the tab off. I'm a lifelong barefoot shoe fan now!!!

I purchased these as a budget barefoot shoe. Advertised with a larger than normal toe box to ensure a natural, comfortable fit.  I purchased my normal size of shoe, was way too small in the toe box. I sent them back and sized up a size. Received new shoes and the toe box was still too small, rubbing on my pinky toe just enough to cause a raw spot in both pinky toes. Going a size up from my normal size made the length fit awkward.  Strap loop to pull shoe on from the back made a ripping sound when used gently to pull shoe on.  Would not recommend. Sizing is off or the toe box is just not up to standards for this industry.

I'm 9.5 and got a 42 based on reviews.  It was too tight at first, but the heel pad compresses after a few weeks and now they are perfect.  They are really comfy.  The toe box is wide.  Not sure why anyone would say otherwise.  No heel lift.  Sufficiently light in weight.  The insert provides cushioning and hasn't been flattened after a month of daily use, unlike super cheap inserts.
El producto es perfecto mucha calidad y comodidad
Like the soft soul, bottom and lots of room in the toys I’ve got a Bigfoot and it works well
These used to be high quality, but the back tab on my 3rd pair I received literally broke first try -- saw lots of glue marks, etc. Something has changed, careful!
Solid traction anywhere!!! Wish they were water proof.
These shoes run bigger than advertised(I've worn size 9 Vans for over 20 years, and an 8.5 were still too big). Also, if you have high arches, these don't offer support at all

评论概述: Great looks & sizing is accurate and fit is good.
评论详情: I love the color and style. But the overall quality is poor and the absolute lack of padding or insole and No arch support at all. My feet were black and blue and deeply brused after a half mile run.And after months of ownership I will not purchase this item again.  Nor can I reccomend this shoe to anyone.

评论概述: Minimal support and comfort on rough surface.
评论详情: Not wide in fore foot as advertised. Runs small in size. It's Just a very thin very soft soft rubber sole with no support. OK, I Guess, to wear on a soft smooth surface but little else.........

评论概述: Good durable shoe for half the price of other barefoot shoe
评论详情: I broke four vibram shoes and each cost me over $100. I order this shoe thinking the cheaper the price, the worse the shoe but to my surprise, this shoe is very sturdy. I run with it and I don’t see any wear and tear at all. I won’t buy anymore Vibram shoe any more. All these other barefoot shoes tried to charge a higher price and provide much worse quality are just ridiculous.
These say they are wide, but not wide enough for me.  Other zero drop shoes fit well, but these were not wide enough.  Quality seems great, though.

I *love* these shoes. They're comfortable and relatively long wearing. A little uncomfortable walking for long times on pavement, but a second thin insert solved this problem. They're the only shoes I wear. Just wish they had something a little more dressy as well

评论概述: Could not find a size that worked for me
评论详情: I tried three versions of this shoe. Women's 10, Women's 11, and Men's 10. I don't know what is wrong with the shoe, but they are very short in my normal size range. I normally wear a women's 10.5. The women's 10 and 11 were too short that my toes were touching the tip. Since the women's version did not have a size 12, I tried the Men's 10, which is equivalent to women's 12 (never in my life have I needed to order such a big size). And of course, these looked like clown shoes on me. Way too big. This brand just wasn't for me.
I wore them hiking last weekend and even went through a couple of rivers. Super comfy and durable. Washed up Great! I highly recommend them.
These shoes feel like they were made using alien materials.... GORGEOUS COMFORTABLE IMPOSSIBLY LIGHT WEIGHT I am ordering 2-3 more.

I bought these based on the reviews, wore them around the house for 1/2 a day, felt very comfortable. Decided to do our usual evening walk (~2.5 miles, ~3 mph pace). About halfway through, the ball of my right foot started feeling uncomfortable, then kept getting more painful. Got home & discovered a huge blood blister about the size of a quarter. Checked the insert, underneath it, bottom of shoe - nothing to cause this. I do have some sensitivity in that area from walking into a rock buried just beneath the sand on a beach ~25 years ago, but have played multiple sports with many different sports shoes (from low-end to high-end) since then and NEVER experienced anything like this. Guess these are not for anyone with any kind of foot issue, regardless of it being pretty much symptom-free for decades.
I recently ditched my clipless shoes after several accidents and bought these shoes, very comfortable and grippy, I will buy different colors
Sole quality is poor and keeps coming off. Appearance is ok but material is average.

It's a nice shoe with one exception... The toe box is not wide. My toes are cramped in there when moving. For example when I'm running at the gym, or playing tennis you need to let the toes be able to spread a little and these don't do it.

Where have these been my whole life! I’ve put over 100 miles on these shoes both treadmill and trails/roads. And they have held up very well. No tears of any kind. The tread seems practically brand new. I highly recommend these.
I like how lightweight this product feels on my feets when out and about whether lumbering for food case baggage or the actual wriggling cutthrotrout.

评论概述: Was sent dirty old shoes no way to  reach seller  so screw em

评论详情: I wear a mens size 10 and that is what I ordered. Fit perfectly. Plenty of room to splay the toes. Great traction. Cannot go wrong for the price. Will see how they hold up over time. Very pleased.

They get the job done, but they're quite rubbery, and have a tendency to slip on rocks because of it. They're pretty cheap, so I'd recommend a better brand like Merrell if you have the cash. These are good if you don't plan on doing anything too intense. They also look kind of dumb, but that's subjective.
Fit well, light and comfortable. Only used on walks but not yet hiking with them.

评论概述: lifetime customer if the quality doesn't change
评论详情: Comfy, durable, and feels like I'm wearing slippers.  Very happy with shoes.  Hopefully they don't change anything in the future 🤞
Had to go up a out .5 of a size
I have flat feet and hate arch support in the shoes. If you’re a person with flat feet, these are your shoes.
Sole platform seems unstable and may allow the foot to roll to the inside; unlike vibram barefoot shoes.  They look nice, but doesn't seem to be a good choice for running.

I like the style. They’re not “loud” but subtle and that fits me great. They look good and I like wearing them. The only thing I would recommend is to firm up the heal sidewalls (a hard plastic ?) to prevent side slipping because you could literally slip out of the shoe depending on the terrine. Because i have high arches that flatten when walking it would be great to have higher and sturdier arch support, even as an option.
These shoes really are comfortable......  I have another pair from a company hike and maybe it's just the ones I got but they feel flimsy and fit horrible....  these I will order more....

I bought this for my indoor rowing workouts. Now I wear them for all of my activities. I have a wide forefoot, like Lord of The Rings feet. I have grown accustomed to foot pain, but I digress. I just ordered another pair of these last evening. I am expanding them into my casual attire menu. The stability I feel in these shoes is amazing too. Love them.
Looks good, just right cushioning. The toe box was too flat for me so I cut slits in the mesh fabric for some give-works great.

I got the left shoe with one hole skipped, the shoe lace cannot be easily adjusted, it needs a special equipment or the shoe will go to trash  This hole in the picture was skipped and the lace was not inserted properly what causes the tongue to move to the opposite direction

Just bought my 3rd pair of shoes from this company and I honestly can't complain at all. They are durable and I put em through it. They are comfortable and they look pretty good too. It's my 3rd pair but my other 2 are still holding up, I just wanted a different color. For the price point, you really can't beat em. I have Xero shoes that I really like for the minimalist footwear, but are twice as much even on sale, so I have no problem buying these and promoting them. Good stuff!

评论概述: Just what I was looking for
评论详情: I love the ones without the strap over the top. of the shoe.  I love the turquoise color over all the other colors.  I was able to send back two pairs without any hassle, very happy with the Co. service.  I am female that needs a wider toe so these work out perfect. Quality so far seems good if I don't come back and change my review you will know they have lasted and I have been happy. Oh, one more thing, when I get them wet while walking they seem to dry quick and no I dont wear socks with these shoes.
Like walking on the ground without shoes.  Had to add an insole for extra thickness of padding. Otherwise , no pinching of the feet and very comfortable for working out.

These are inexpensive, but they're comfortable, minimal, and do what I need them to do. I use them for trail running. I don't expect them to last forever (they're running shoes). Only issue I had was when I got them wet while wearing no socks and got a blister on my little toe. That was mitigated by using Sportslick. I also found that wearing socks prevented the issue, but I don't like wearing socks for trail running.
Good fit. Expected color of the soles to be deeper orange color like the photo.

For first time users of this type of shoe your feet, calves and legs will need to become accustomed to walking in them. They are light weight and have enough protection to walk on the trails with. Not expensive and decent quality for the price of admission.
Materials are low quality.
They are slippy when wet, but that's far outweighed by the comfort and benefits of using zero drop shoes xx
These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I’ve worn. My feet are on the wide side and the toe box is very comfortable and ample in space. I’m going to order another pair.
We like the fit and feel of the shoe but the inner foam sole shredded after just a few months of normal wear, the heel and the ball of your feet.
i was advised to order the smaller size if between. i was in between 7.5 and 8. I ordered 7.5, I had to order 8

Not very comfortable and smaller than expected given I had to go up half a size. Still not much room in the toebox. I was hoping for a more affordable Merrell Vaporglove but these aren't it. I don't think I'd buy again.
Comfy

These are quite possibly the most comfortable shoes I've worn in a long time. I was concerned about the drawstring lacing method but that system has proved to be more secure than I imagined. I've been wearing these walking at the gym for about two weeks now and putting them on today, the loop in the back on the right shoe just ripped right off. Upon closer inspection, the loop ripped off right along the stitching, almost like it was perforated for easy removal. They are still wearable, I'm just disappointed they are falling apart after two weeks.

评论概述: Best fitting gym shoe I've owned
评论详情: Usually an 11.5 but read that the sizes tend to run larger. Ordered an 11 and fit REALLY well. I have wide feet and can say they are the best shoe I've owned for the gym. I typically do lots of stair climber, squats, and core and balance 5x/wk. Was immediately shocked how more stable i feel going up steps or incline treadmill. Standing on one foot with these on and maintaining that balance is much easier. Read that the longevity of these are not the best but at the price point who cares compared to a $100+ pair of shoes (Nike, brooks, Adidas, etc.) when you usually wear those for a year or two anyways and have to buy a new pair. When these wear out I'll buy another pair.  I'm a pretty realistic individual and rarely post comments or reviews but these deserved one.
Very comfortable, much better than putting on flip flops and way more versatile.

评论概述: Great shoes for a great price
评论详情: I wear these a lot outdoors. They slip on easy and surpassed my expectations for comfort and durability.
El producto no cumple con lo que dice. No son para correr, tienen "0" densidad. Te destrozas la planta del pie si corres con ellas. Son cómodas y bonitas pero nada más.

These are very comfortable to wear. The bottoms are a little thin so you feel the impression of rocks when you walk but they don’t hurt great for being in the water or just out and about and they fit true to size at least they did for me.

This item arrived in good condition and fast.  The shoe is lightweight and feels good on the feet. It flexs well, traction is good and does NOT squeeze foot together allowing the foot room to flex and breath.This is a great buy!  ;)
These shoes have a nice wide toe area.  They are very comfortable and are just what I needed.  They take a little getting used to, but in a few days you will wish you had bought them sooner.
I like the shoes. They are very comfortable. I use them for my workouts. They seem to run so I would order at least half a size larger.
These shoes are like being barefoot.  If you have wide feet they are awesome.  First pair of shoes that I didn’t have to return.  True to size and very colorful.
Love the fit and love the colors!!!

评论概述: Very pleased - just what I was looking for
评论详情: WHITIN Men's Minimalist Trail Runner - GreenI've worn size 9.5 in Merrell's for 20 years so I wasn't sure what size to get in these.  I went with 9 and they fit perfect.  10 would definitely have been too big.  These seem well made and the draw string lace tightens down nicely.  Padding around the ankle and top of foot is good.  I've worked out in these a few times and road a Rogue Echo bike and they felt great.  I'm leaving the insert in for now and don't see any need to take it out.  Hopefully they last, but for now they are great.
Would purchase again as these we very comfortable running and doing our obstacle races when wet and muddy still felt light and comfortable.
what I like is the look and the feel of quality
